document_data.mainbody: e order was made up of chivalrous knights, which were subdivided into three orders. The knights of these orders were known as the Knights of the Crown, the Knights of the Rose, and the Knights of the Sword. Such knights had to take an oath to their order.

document_data.Activities:
The Knights of Solamnia protected the [[spelljammer|spelljamming]] port on the city of Palanthus in the continent of Ansalon.

A similar organization known as the [[Star Knights]], founded by retired Knight of Solamnia [[Dante Lionmane]], patrolled [[Krynnspace]] and the surroundings of Krynn from Dante's [[Dragonfly (spelljammer)|dragonfly]].
document_data.History: Around [[1369 DR]], a trio of knights, one from each respective order, became stranded on [[Toril]], a planet far from their own. They became trapped in their [[Planar Sphere]] and ended up in [[Athkatla]], a city on the continent of [[Faer√ªn]]. Some Athkatlans believed the sphere to be a thing or worship, whilst others merely seemed to profit off of it.
